channel.title: DNF on Superdanby
channel.description: Recent content in DNF on Superdanby

item.title: System Upgrading Fedora Through DNF
item.description: Ideal procedures Make sure the system is up to date: sudo dnf upgrade --refresh Reboot the system Install the system upgrade plugin: sudo dnf install dnf-plugin-system-upgrade System upgrade to the targeted release: sudo dnf system-upgrade download --refresh --releasever=28 There may be some dependency issues. Use --allowerasing or --best wisely. Upgrade Failure Trigger the upgrade: sudo dnf system-upgrade reboot More Information https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/DNF_system_upgrade `
